reprocessDialog.title: Reprocess from Database: {taskType}
reprocessDialog.explanation: When a task runs, we always save its result to the database, so you can process it again later, without having to re-run the task on the task server.

transcribe.description: Do you want to delete existing data before reprocessing?
transcribe.warning: For transcribe tasks, we recommend deleting first to avoid creating duplicate content.

default.description: This will process the saved result again from the database.
default.info: Any existing data will be updated automatically.
